subject: Status of #SSN4441
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered the new shifter on December 5th. It said it would be shipped
starting December 15th. Then it changed to December 19th on product page
but I wasn't noticed. Now it is December 22nd and it's still not shipped.

What is the status?

/Martin

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin Fredriksson,    The 2-in-1 shifter will start shipping from today. There has been a slight adjustment to the delivery schedule due to changes in some components.

Thanks for the update. But it seems still it has not shipped three days
later?

Kind regards
Hi Martin Fredriksson,      Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.Â
